title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo – CLI and Go library to pull, run and manage GGUF models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API for chat, embed, pull and list operations.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; identical API surface to Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama (PyPI)
summary: LangChain adapter providing Ollama LLM & embeddings components with standard LangChain interface.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured, open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that talks to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Community-built interactive CLI helper that wraps ollama commands with fuzzy model search & chat history.

title: Ollama4j – Java client
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin library exposing all Ollama endpoints with POJO models and RxJava extensions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot chat requests to a local Ollama model for offline assistance.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset letting you use Ollama models as Generator or Embedder in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation combining Ollama LLM with Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK exposing Ollama REST endpoints with async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with any local Ollama model through slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-affinity and model auto-pull sidecars.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service container during CI for integration testing of LLM features.

title: ollama-models (Hugging Face)
summary: Curated Hugging Face organization hosting GGUF conversions of popular models ready for ollama pull.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a “Chat with note” command powered by an Ollama model running locally.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket-Mode to answer questions via Ollama with per-channel model selection.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service template that proxies and extends Ollama endpoints with JWT auth and usage analytics.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate offering strongly-typed async wrappers over Ollama REST API using reqwest and tokio.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that streams Ollama responses with session memory and parameter sliders.
